definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to autocracy or to an autocrat ; absolute ; holding independent and arbitrary powers of government .
examples: In recent years, the prime minister has become increasingly autocratic .

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the manner of an autocrat .
examples: Despite his lack of actual authority, his autocratic demeanour annoyed many of his colleagues.

main_definition: Of or pertaining to autocracy or to an autocrat ; absolute ; holding independent and arbitrary powers of government .
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory ) Of or pertaining to the manner of an autocrat .
